user_question: Show me all apartments in zipcode 02215 with 2 bedrooms and rent under $3000
cypher_query: MATCH (a:Apartment) WHERE a.apt_zip_code = '02215' AND a.apt_bedroom_count = 2 AND a.apt_rent < 3000 RETURN a

user_question: Find apartments in Queensberry area with Indian restaurants nearby
cypher_query: MATCH (a:Apartment)-[:has_nearby_restaurant]->(r:Restaurant) WHERE a.apt_address CONTAINS 'Queensberry' AND r.restaurant_cuisine CONTAINS 'Indian' RETURN a

user_question: List all apartments in zipcode 02116 with a park nearby
What's the average rent for 1-bedroom apartments in zipcode 02118?
cypher_query: MATCH (a:Apartment) WHERE a.apt_zip_code = '02118' AND a.apt_bedroom_count = 1 RETURN avg(a.apt_rent) as average_rent

user_question: Find apartments with 2 bathrooms and rent between $2500 and $3000 in any of the three zipcodes
cypher_query: MATCH (a:Apartment) WHERE a.apt_zip_code IN ['02215', '02116', '02118'] AND a.apt_bathroom_count = 2 AND a.apt_rent >= 2500 AND a.apt_rent <= 3000 RETURN a

user_question: Show apartments in zipcode 02215 with Korean restaurants within walking distance
cypher_query: MATCH (a:Apartment)-[:has_nearby_restaurant]->(r:Restaurant) WHERE a.apt_zip_code = '02215' AND r.restaurant_cuisine CONTAINS 'Korean' RETURN a

user_question: List apartments in any zipcode with both a park and a Chinese restaurant nearby
cypher_query: MATCH (a:Apartment)-[:has_nearby_park]->(p:Park), (a)-[:has_nearby_restaurant]->(r:Restaurant) WHERE a.apt_zip_code IN ['02215', '02116', '02118'] AND r.restaurant_cuisine CONTAINS 'Chinese' RETURN a

user_question: Find the apartment with the highest rent in zipcode 02116
cypher_query: MATCH (a:Apartment) WHERE a.apt_zip_code = '02116' RETURN a ORDER BY a.apt_rent DESC LIMIT 1

user_question: Show me apartments in zipcode 02118 with more than 2 bedrooms and at least 2 bathrooms
cypher_query: MATCH (a:Apartment) WHERE a.apt_zip_code = '02118' AND a.apt_bedroom_count > 2 AND a.apt_bathroom_count >= 2 RETURN a

user_question: List apartments in any zipcode with Italian restaurants nearby, ordered by rent from lowest to highest
cypher_query: MATCH (a:Apartment)-[:has_nearby_restaurant]->(r:Restaurant) WHERE a.apt_zip_code IN ['02215', '02116', '02118'] AND r.restaurant_cuisine CONTAINS 'Italian' RETURN a ORDER BY a.apt_rent ASC
